text:
="preserve">Vicente Yap Emano (31 March 1943 – 7 May 2019) was a Filipino politician. He served as governor of the province of Misamis Oriental from 1986 to 1995. He was the mayor of Tagoloan from 1980 to 1983. He was also the mayor of the city of Cagayan de Oro from 1998 to 2007, and again from 2010 to 2013. He was born in Tagoloan.
Emano died of pneumonia on 7 May 2019, at the age of 76.
